verses.text: And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to \w burn|strong="H4729"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* upon: \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it.

A \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof; \w foursquare|strong="H7251"\w* shall it be: and two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof: the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* of the same.

And thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, the \w top|strong="H1406"\w* thereof, and the \w sides|strong="H7023"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* thereof; and thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* unto it a \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 30.3 \ft top: Heb. roof\f*\f + \fr 30.3 \ft sides: Heb. walls\f*

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* to it under the \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of it, by the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w corners|strong="H6763"\w* thereof, upon the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sides|strong="H6654"\w* of it shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add it;\add* and they shall be for \w places|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* it \w withal|strong="H1992"\w*.\f + \fr 30.4 \ft corners: Heb. ribs\f*

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* that \add is\add* by the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* that \add is\add* over the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, where I will \w meet|strong="H3259"\w* with thee.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* thereon \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: when he \w dresseth|strong="H3190"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, he shall burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* upon it.\f + \fr 30.7 \ft sweet incense: Heb. incense of spices\f*

And when \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w lighteth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, he shall burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* upon it, a \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 30.8 \ft lighteth: or setteth up: Heb. causeth to ascend\f*\f + \fr 30.8 \ft at even: Heb. between the two evenings\f*

Ye shall \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* no \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* thereon, nor burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, nor meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*; neither shall ye \w pour|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* thereon.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of it \w once|strong="H0259"\w* in a \w year|strong="H8141"\w* with the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* of \w atonements|strong="H3725"\w*: \w once|strong="H0259"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* shall he make \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* upon it throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*: it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

When thou \w takest|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* after their \w number|strong="H6485"\w*, then shall they \w give|strong="H5414"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* a \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w* for his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when thou \w numberest|strong="H6485"\w* them; that there be no \w plague|strong="H5063"\w* among them, when \add thou\add* \w numberest|strong="H6485"\w* them.\f + \fr 30.12 \ft their number: Heb. them that are to be numbered\f*

This they shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w*, every one that \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* them that are \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, \w half|strong="H4276"\w* a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*: (a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* \add is\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w gerahs|strong="H1626"\w*:) an \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Every one that \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* among them that are \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* an \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* shall not give \w more|strong="H7235"\w*, and the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* shall not give \w less|strong="H4591"\w* than \w half|strong="H4276"\w* a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*, when \add they\add* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* an \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 30.15 \ft give more: Heb. multiply\f*\f + \fr 30.15 \ft give less: Heb. diminish\f*

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and shalt \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* it for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*; that it may be a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thou shalt also \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and his \w foot|strong="H3653"\w* \add also of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, to \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \add withal:\add* and thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* it between the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* therein.
For \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* and their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* thereat:

When they \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, they shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, that they \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not; or when they come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w*, to burn \w offering|strong="H6999"\w* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

So they shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* and their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, that they \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not: and it shall be a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* to them, \add even\add* to him and to his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* throughout their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.
¶ Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thou also unto thee \w principal|strong="H7218"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, of \w pure|strong="H1865"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add*, and of \w sweet|strong="H1314"\w* \w cinnamon|strong="H7076"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w* so \w much|strong="H4276"\w*, \add even\add* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \add shekels\add*, and of \w sweet|strong="H1314"\w* \w calamus|strong="H7070"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \add shekels\add*,

And of \w cassia|strong="H6916"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w*:

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it an \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* of \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w ointment|strong="H4888"\w*, an \w ointment|strong="H7545"\w* \w compound|strong="H4842"\w* after the \w art|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w apothecary|strong="H7543"\w*: it shall be an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.\f + \fr 30.25 \ft apothecary: or, perfumer\f*

And thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* therewith, and the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*,

And the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* and all his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* and his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*,
And the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* with all his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* and his \w foot|strong="H3653"\w*.

And thou shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them, that they may be \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*: whatsoever \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* them shall be \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.

And thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* them, that \add they\add* may minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This shall be an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* unto me throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

Upon \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall it not be \w poured|strong="H3251"\w*, neither shall ye \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add any other\add* like it, after the \w composition|strong="H4971"\w* of it: it \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, \add and\add* it shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto you.

\w Whosoever|strong="H0834"\w* \w compoundeth|strong="H7543"\w* \add any\add* like it, or whosoever \w putteth|strong="H5414"\w* \add any\add* of it upon a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*, shall even be \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* off from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* unto thee sweet \w spices|strong="H5561"\w*, \w stacte|strong="H5198"\w*, and \w onycha|strong="H7827"\w*, and \w galbanum|strong="H2464"\w*; \add these\add* \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w spices|strong="H5561"\w* with \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*: of \w each|strong="H0905"\w* shall there be a \w like|strong="H0905"\w* \add weight:\add*

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it a \w perfume|strong="H7004"\w*, a \w confection|strong="H7545"\w* after the \w art|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w apothecary|strong="H7543"\w*, \w tempered|strong="H4414"\w* together, \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \add and\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*:\f + \fr 30.35 \ft tempered…: Heb. salted\f*

And thou shalt \w beat|strong="H7833"\w* \add some\add* of it very \w small|strong="H1854"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* of it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, where I will \w meet|strong="H3259"\w* with thee: it shall be unto you \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

And \add as for\add* the \w perfume|strong="H7004"\w* which thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w*, ye shall not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* to yourselves according to the \w composition|strong="H4971"\w* thereof: it shall be unto thee \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
\w Whosoever|strong="H0834"\w* shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* like unto that, to \w smell|strong="H7306"\w* thereto, shall even be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
